title: Animator / Illustrator for YouTube videos
job_overview:
We’re looking for a full-time illustrator/animator to help bring our YouTube stories to life with engaging, stylized visuals. The content is light, curiosity-driven, and centers around real-world financial stories.

You’ll work closely with the channel creator to design characters, scenes, and light animations for 2–3 videos per month.

- What You’ll Be Doing
Design consistent, expressive cartoon-style characters (anime-influenced or Pixar/Ghibli-lite tone)

Illustrate detailed scenes (offices, courtrooms, newsrooms, etc.) based on provided scripts

Deliver layered files (PSD or AI) for animation

Create light motion for key scenes (zoom/pan, blinking, talking heads, looping gestures)

Collaborate on visual storytelling to enhance pacing and tone

Occasionally assist with thumbnails or infographics

-Ideal Skills
Strong 2D illustration (cartoon, anime, Ghibli, or modern explainer style)

Character design + background illustration

Comfortable working with reference scripts/storyboards

Bonus: Light animation/motion design (CapCut, After Effects, Canva, etc.)

Bonus: Experience designing for YouTube, web video, or social media content

-Tools You Might Use
Photoshop / Illustrator / Clip Studio / Procreate

CapCut / After Effects (for motion)

Google Drive / Figma (for storyboards & revisions)

Optional: MidJourney, RunwayML, or other AI tools for concepting

-Workload + Expectations
2–3 full-length videos/month (10–15 min each)

Each video needs ~10–15 scenes + character reuse

Must be responsive to feedback and meet weekly deadlines

Workload: Full-time (or part-time trial, leading to full-time)
